toast.gobyError4001: Please finish setting up Goby first.

faq.answer1:
dexie is a peer-to-peer exchange for Chia offer files. Offer files are completely decentralized and trustless.

dexie holds no custody of coins, they always stay in the wallet of the maker until the offer is accepted, at which point the assets are transferred securely between the maker and taker within a single transaction on the blockchain without any intermediary.

Learn more about offer files in the official Chia Documentation.
faq.answer2: Contact us on twitter at @dexie_space or check our discord channel, we are always happy to help.

markets.#buyPriceHint{{depth}}:
The unit price for buying {{depth}} {{market}} of volume
and how much each {{market}} would get.
markets.#sellPriceHint{{depth}}:
The unit price for selling {{depth}} {{market}} of volume
and how much each {{market}} would cost.
markets.#priceChangeHint{{depth}}:
The change of the average price (buy and sell with {{depth}} {{market}} depth)
over the last 24 hours.
markets.#totalOfferedHint{{depth}}:
The sum of each offered asset.
Markets are ranked by most {{market}} in active offer files locked.
Offers with duplicate inputs are ignored.
markets.{{market}} subheading: All known assets with at least 1 {{market}} buy and sell liquidity.
